doc.field: WEEKLY T-BILL TENDER SET AT 80 MLN DLRS

- The Reserve Bank said it will offer 80 mln N.Z. Dlrs of treasury bills at its regular weekly tender tomorrow. The Bank said in a statement it will offer 30 mln dlrs of 56-day treasury bills and 50 mln dlrs of 77-day Bills. The Bank will also buy 170 mln dlrs of bills maturing in early June and 200 mln dlrs of bills maturing late June for its own portfolio.
